title: Carrying a little girl in a dream

preview.html: And if he cries with him, this is a sign of his worries in his life, and they will go away, God willing, in a very short time. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant young girl in a dream for a single girl: To see yourself carrying a young girl in a dream for an unmarried girl, means that a lot of good is coming to her. It is interpreted as It means achieving a high position in her work or studies in the coming period, God willing. It also indicates the end of the conflicts that she is experiencing with someone she loves during this period. If the little girl is sick in the dream, and he carries her in his arms in the dream and he knows that. This indicates On the illness of this unmarried girl in her life in the coming period, and her great sadness, and God knows best. It also explains that she entered into difficult issues in her life during this time that do not end easily. And if the unmarried woman carries the child in her arms in the dream, and laughs with her a lot in The dream. An indication of the abundance of goodness and livelihood in the life of this single, dreaming girl, God willing. And for her to live with absolute stability in her life, far from psychological and physical pressures. See also: A child in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a girl getting pregnant in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that she She is carrying an unidentified child in her arms and laughing with her. It is a reference to the doors of nourishment that will open for her in this season of her life, God willing. She declares complete stability that she will live with her husband and marital happiness between them. A married woman dreams that she is carrying a small child in her arms and is sick. She explained that she herself will suffer. And her family is in the near future suffering from the disease, and they are sad about it. It also indicates that during this period she was exposed to some of the many psychological tensions in her life. Seeing a pregnant woman carrying a small child in a dream for a married woman who has never given birth again in her life is an indication that the time of her pregnancy is approaching, God willing, and that this The dream is a blessing from God to her. It also indicates success in her life and achieving her goals and herself during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant girl in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman who saw in a dream that she was carrying a baby girl, and was crying loudly with her. A sign that she is going through some bad things. In her life, which she feels very sad about. It also explains that he will be experiencing a big crisis at the moment and is trying to end it. A divorced man who looks at a young girl in a dream and holds her while playing with her. It shows the happy life that she is living in front of her now and the good things that she is experiencing. It is also interpreted that He will live with a new person as soon as possible in a project or work. A divorced woman is carrying a little girl in her arms in a dream, and she was sick and crying intensely. This is an indication that there are tiring things that she will experience and go through in this period of her life. It also indicates the great misery that she will go through This divorced woman has it. Read also: Seeing a male child in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing a young girl carrying a child in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees the little girl in a dream and carries her in his arms in a dream. The meaning indicates a happy life and the goals that he will achieve.

title: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Watermelon is a delicious summer fruit that many people love. Seeing watermelon in a dream has many meanings. Seeing watermelon can be a good sign or an omen. Interpreters differ in their interpretation of seeing watermelon. In a dream, according to the size and color of the watermelon, and depending on the condition and circumstances of the dreamer, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through a vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lot of watermelon in the dreamer’s house indicates the upcoming death of a member of this house, and God knows best. Seeing green or fresh watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer is enjoying a full life. In good health and not exposed to incurable diseases. Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates the existence of a strong emotional relationship between him and the person he loves. Seeing yourself eating watermelon seeds in a dream indicates a son who is oppressed by his family. See also: Interpretation of seeing orange peel, watermelon, or eggs in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Watermelon in a dream in Nabulsi: A man seeing watermelon in a dream indicates the problems he is going through that plague his life. Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through many problems and obstacles whose end time is not known. Seeing yourself eating watermelon in a dream indicates death crises. And the worries and difficulties in the life of the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall ill soon, and God knows best. Seeing green watermelon in a dream shows a lot of money that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing yourself eating green watermelon in a dream is It indicates the end of sadness, anguish, and judgments from the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a single woman: Seeing one watermelon in a dream indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing watermelon for an unmarried woman in his time in a dream indicates success and good luck that He will accompany her in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman eating watermelon in a dream shows many good things that she will accept soon. Seeing a single woman eating watermelon out of season in a dream shows many bad things that will happen to her soon. Seeing a large watermelon in a dream for a single woman shows that the person who Marrying him will be of great importance. See also: Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman watermelon in a dream shows that she will get a lot of money. Seeing a married woman eating watermelon in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a child soon. Seeing A married woman’s watermelon in a dream indicates the release of worries and sorrows and the release of obstacles in the coming period. Seeing a yellow married woman’s watermelon in a dream indicates a beautiful woman who cares about her elegance. Seeing a married woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: What is the interpretation of eating rice in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about eating rice in a dream: It indicates good things if they are free of insects and dirt, and the dreamer may eat a lot, but if the rice appears black or contains insects such as ants and small scorpions, these symbols are undesirable. To see evil and report it, and there are many other interpretations that you will know in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Eating rice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating rice indicates money, and if the dreamer eats a lot of it, this is evidence of expanding his livelihood and moving to... A better material and social level. The jurists preached to every man who worked hard in his life and was very patient to achieve his goals, that seeing the symbol of rice means the end of the struggle journey with great success and prosperity in work and money. When the dreamer eats dirty rice and feels uncomfortable in the dream when he sees it, the meaning of the dream indicates that he will be exposed to bad lessons and false words from some people, and his reputation may be tarnished due to the spread of rumors. About him. If the dreamer eats large quantities of rice, this is evidence of immeasurable money, and this money is permissible if the rice is white and free of impurities. If the rice spills on the ground while the dreamer is eating it and makes it dirty, this requires a lot of effort until the amount of rice is collected from The dream shows the difficulty and great efforts made by the dreamer. If the dreamer sees grains of rice covered with its husk, then he is a person who is very concerned with the money he gets from work and only spends it on important matters. The jurists said that the symbol of the rice husk or its cover in the dream shows the dreamer’s desire In earning halal money. When the dreamer eats rice with pasta and the taste was so delicious that he ate a lot, the dream indicates a business project that the dreamer establishes with another person and their cooperation will be beneficial and bring them a lot of food. Eating rice in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen the dreamer eats rice inside his house And its taste is good, this is a good sign and indicates the presence of happiness and joy in his home after long periods of fatigue and sadness. If a divorced woman sees that she is in a new home that she does not really know, and eating rice inside it, this indicates that she will marry again, and her next marriage will be happy and full of optimism and positive energy. If the dreamer was wronged in his job and was fired from it, and he saw that he ate a lot of rice and enjoyed it, this indicates a new career stage in his life that will be God’s reward for him, and he will achieve everything he has. Material and professional goals. In some cases, the scene of eating rice indicates that the dreamer is entering a phase with some obstacles, but they will end quickly and after that he will get a lot of nutrition. When the dreamer cooks an amount of rice that smells good and tastes delicious, and family members eat it, The dream here shows the love and calm that prevails in his home because he lives a beautiful family life. All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of eating rice in a dream. Eating rice in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about eating rice indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a black bear in a dream

preview.html: A black bear in a dream, as this animal is a snake that, if seen in a dream, is considered one of the disturbing and frightening visions for many people, men and women, which if seen in a dream arouses curiosity by learning about the meanings, interpretations, and implications it contains, and many interpreters of Dreamers who tried to clarify these interpretations, and in these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the black beam in a dream. The black bear in a dream. It is worth noting that seeing it in a dream in abundance is evidence of family hostility, and this vision is a warning to its owner, as it includes many meanings and different meanings, and accordingly We will explain the following. The interpretation of seeing a black bear in a dream is also: Seeing it in a dream is a sign of hostility and conflict arising between the dreamer and someone. As he has hatred and envy, either neighbors, friends, or colleagues. Moreover, if one sees it, whether it is a woman Or a man, in a dream, that he brings a black snake to his house of his own free will. This is a reference to his deceitful friend, who has a good appearance to him, and has envy and hatred, and tries to harm him in various ways. You often see a black snake in a dream. It is an indication of the presence of deception and betrayal that The dreamer is exposed to it, which may be from the family or neighbors. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the top interpreters for married and single women. Seeing a black bear in a dream and killing it, as seeing it is considered one of the disturbing visions that causes fear and anxiety for many people, but if it tends to see it, it can It must be a praiseworthy vision that shows the goodness of the dreamer, and along these lines we will explain the interpretation of seeing a black bear in a dream and killing it. It is also: seeing a large black snake killed and eating its head in a dream. It is a sign of recovering rights and money stolen from the owner of the vision, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a person sees that Killing a black snake is great. It indicates the position of many people beside the dreamer who are working to help and support him. Seeing a black snake in a married man’s dream and killing him and burying him under the dirt. It is a sign of tolerance, kindness and purity in the dreamer’s intention, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation The dream of seeing divorce in a dream for a married and single woman. The black bear in a dream for a single woman. Since seeing this animal has different interpretations and meanings that it contains, based on the social status of the Lord, and many interpreters have explained these meanings that may be evidence of goodness or evidence of evil, In these lines, we will explain the interpretation of seeing a black bear in a single woman’s dream. It is also: Seeing one girl in a dream is evidence that you are carrying negative and dark thoughts. She also follows her desires, and there are those who are waiting for her in her life, and God is Most High and knows her. Seeing a black snake in a girl’s dream She is not married. It is a sign from God Almighty that she should be slow in making decisions in her life, and control her mind, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing yourself drowning in a dream in detail from the most famous

title: Secrets of interpreting a dream about giving a dead person money to a living person in a dream for good and evil

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of dreams, giving money to live in a dream in detail, dreaming of known or unknown people is one of the mysterious dreams that arouses the dreamer’s curiosity to know the meanings and consequences of this vision for him, and among these visions is dreaming of the dead in various This vision is one of the visions that received many different interpretations and interpretations of dreams, because it contains hidden messages that deserve praise or hatred, whether for the dreamer or the deceased. We will know this through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about giving money to the dead to live in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that a dead person he knows and belongs to gives him some money, this indicates that this person will cancel something he hopes for or inherit something from him. The person who sees in his dream that a dead person gives him something he loves from the comforts of the world, this is an indication that the dreamer will gain the good that he did not take into account. And whoever sees that the dead person eats him in his sleep, this is a sign that the fortune teller obtains a blessed livelihood from a living person he does not know. And whoever sees that the dead person gave him honey, this indicates that the fortune teller is enriched from where he does not expect. Dream interpretation scholars, especially Ibn Shaheen, interpreted the vision of the deceased giving money to the dreamer as one of the praiseworthy visions and a promise to achieve what the dreamer wants in reality, and it is also an indication of abundant sustenance. Ibn Shaheen also interpreted this vision as a sign of earning a lot of money from inheritance, and God knows best. But if the dreamer refuses to take money from the dead, then this vision is one of the hateful visions that express the emergence of an annoying matter that makes the dreamer sad and gloomy. If the dreamer dreams that he is giving money to the deceased, then this dream is nothing but an indication of the dreamer's good deeds in giving alms to the deceased in reality, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees that the deceased did not accept to take money from him in the dream, this indicates the dreamer's bad deeds and his committing of his sins and disobedience, including stealing money in reality, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased giving money to the beard in a dream If the dreamer refuses to take money from the dead in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will not accept change in his life. Seeing the dreamer giving money to the deceased in a dream symbolizes the occurrence of disputes between him and the family of the deceased in reality. As for the dreamer who sees that the deceased in a dream asks him for money, this is an unfavorable vision for the condition of the deceased to another, and asks the dreamer to pray for him and give charity On him. When the dreamer sees that he is receiving money from his deceased father in a dream, this is a sign that his circumstances will change for the better. If the dreamer is really single and sees that he is getting money from the dead, this vision is good news that he will get married soon, God knows best. But if the dreamer is actually traveling, this is evidence of his exposure to travel crises. Seeing banknotes taken from the dead in a dream means that the dreamer will quarrel with his friends in reality. If you see a dead person giving money to a living person, this indicates a very large expense. If a man sees himself taking money from a dead person while he is asleep, this is a sign of

title: Interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for a single woman: rain in reality indicates goodness and blessing and causes joy and pleasure when it falls, and seeing rain in a dream is a dream that indicates nourishment and goodness that will dominate a person, God willing. But in the event of heavy rain and torrential rains, it warns of some problems and obstacles that stand in the dreamer’s way, but interpretation scholars differed according to the social position of the forerunner and according to the vision that the dreamer sees, and today we have prepared our article for you to explain to you the interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for single women.Interpretation of the vision Winter in Dreams The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin narrates the following interpretations of seeing winter in a dream: It symbolizes the dreamer’s reputation in his religion, morals, and worldly affairs. The damage that is caused to the earth as a result of rain falling on it is a harbinger of calamity. Winter in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness and abundance in the dreamer’s life. Winter in autumn in a dream in summer shows the disaster that will occur in the area where the dreamer saw rain. Interpretation of seeing winter in a dream by Ibn ShaheenWhile Ibn Shaheen says about seeing winter in a dream the following interpretations: Light rain symbolizes bliss and nourishment, while heavy rain indicates distress. And loss. Seeing the fall of winter and rain at the beginning of the year is good news for those who see that it will be a happy year with a lot of goodness, comfort, and response to the request of God Almighty. Seeing a sick person bathing in winter water indicates a speedy recovery at the command of God. Washing with rain water symbolizes acceptance by God Almighty. By worshiping and obeying the dreamer, even if he was a sinner, he repents and repents to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for a single woman. Here in the following points is the interpretation of seeing winter in a dream for a single woman: Seeing it in a dream indicates the emergence of goodness and success in his academic and social life. It symbolizes an unmarried woman standing in a dream. Under the winter to get a dream job or enter into a happy romantic relationship. If a single woman or someone from her family is facing problems and adversities, then this dream is good news and a stop to stress. Heavy rain in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes marriage to a generous and brave man. Interpretation of seeing light rain: Light rain falling in a dream is a sign of good news that will come soon. And if the light snow that falls in the sky does not harm the dreamer, then there is money and sustenance blessed by God. Imam Nabulsi says: The arrival of light winter and dew drops is good for us to get rid of sorrows. And adversity. The arrival of light winter in a man’s dream indicates that he has found the beautiful girl after years of searching and wishing. Interpretation of seeing heavy rain. Winter, which falls in a dream in abundance, but does not cause loss or damage to the land, indicates the degree to which the dreamer has in terms of wealth and prestigious status in Society.Heavy rain that causes losses, such as torrential rain, symbolizes life difficulties and problems at work or money.Heavy rain accompanied by winds and storms foretells that something unpleasant will happen in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman wearing two gold rings

preview.html: Especially since there is a common belief that the appearance of gold in a dream symbolizes distress or sadness and anguish, and this is what we published in today’s article from your website gptafser.com/ for men and women. Interpretation of seeing wearing two rings in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl wearing two gold rings in a dream. Among her visions The good thing is that she will soon marry a rich man, and God knows best. As for the unmarried girl who dreams of seeing a ruby ​​ring and was pleased with it in the dream. This indicates that she will marry a young man who has influence and power and has a lot in society, and God knows best. And the engaged girl who dreams of seeing a broken golden ring A bad vision for her and it appears that the engagement has not ended, and God knows best. The only girl who sees herself searching for a lost gold ring in her dream. It is a sign of rivalry between her and her best friend and she is searching for it again. And in the event that the unmarried girl sees that a young man she does not know has He wears a gold ring on her in a dream. A metaphor for her marriage to a respectable young man. And if an unmarried girl sees that the young man she loves gave her two gold rings in a dream, and she agreed. It shows that he will propose to her soon and she will be very happy with him. Seeing a green ring in a dream. Indicates life Smooth, living, and blessed, and he is a positive character. See also: Interpretation of a dream about getting gold from a familiar person. Interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing two rings in a dream. When a married woman dreams of seeing an unknown person she does not know, wearing two gold rings for her in a dream. It is considered a metaphor for a lot of nourishment that she gets without Knowing its source, and God knows best. As for a married woman who dreams of her husband wearing a gold ring, it has many connotations, including the occurrence of pregnancy, including ensuring her livelihood. This may mean his intense love for her and his devotion to her, and God knows best. Seeing the sale of a gold ring in a dream to a married woman. It symbolizes Disagreements appear between the mother and her husband, and God knows best. A married woman dreams of seeing a broken gold ring in a dream. A metaphor for her husband’s severe financial crisis. It may indicate that she is suffering from some disease or that she feels intense anxiety and pressure on her children, and God knows best. When a pregnant woman dreams of wearing more than A gold ring in a dream with a black lobes. It is a symbol of pregnancy in a male child, God willing, and God knows best. As for seeing a gold ring decorated with green in a married woman’s dream, it is evidence of abundant sustenance and hearing good news in it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a man wearing two rings in a dream and its meaning. As for a married man When he dreams of himself in a jewelry store and buying a gold ring for his wife in a dream, it is a good sign of pregnancy and good offspring. A man who gives a gold ring to a girl in a dream indicates that he will soon marry a girl from a respectable family, and God knows best. A man who works in trade saw a gold ring in A dream. It is considered a good sign of the success of his business and the acquisition of many livelihoods. Seeing buying gold in a dream, foretells that the fortuneteller will receive a promotion. As for the sick person, when he sees himself buying a gold ring in a dream. Good news for recovery from illness and relief from pain and fatigue. The man who dreams To wash the gold ring

title: Interpretation of seeing the beloved’s family in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation and various other interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the family of the beloved in a dream, the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and various other interpretations. The clearest details in the interpretation of dreams. In this article, today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the family of the beloved in a dream, the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and various other interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the family of the beloved in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation Ibn Sirin is the only girl who sees in her dream the family of the person she feels love towards. This dream symbolizes the feelings that this girl feels, as she feels love and stability towards him in this relationship. If the girl sees in her dream that the family of the person she loves, then this dream is a good dream, It shows acceptance of her son’s marriage and his relationship with her. It is a bad vision for an unmarried girl to see that the family of the person she loves frowns in a dream and feels sad or angry, and this dream means that in reality they do not approve of their son’s relationship with her, and that they themselves do not want to consummate their marriage. Vision Your loved ones in a dream about one person is a promising dream because it indicates that this girl will achieve all the dreams and goals that she seeks in her life and that these dreams will bring her happiness and pleasure. Some dream interpretation researchers say that a girl seeing her lover’s family in a dream indicates that the lover’s family feels... With closeness and tenderness towards the girl’s family and that the relationship between them is good without malice or malice. This dream symbolizes that this girl thinks a lot about wanting to marry the person she loves and that she is waiting for the moment when this connection will come. This dream may indicate that the person she loves is in a relationship He is very attached to his family, and that they have a special place in his life, and that they have priority in everything related to them, and that the girl should know that. Well, realizing that his family is more important to him than her, and seeing if he can handle that or not. One of the good symbols of seeing a lover’s family in a dream is that the parents will treat the girl well after the marriage is complete and she will not feel alienated when she is among them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the entrance to a house The family of the beloved in a dream for a single woman. There are many interpretations given by dream interpretation scholars about seeing the same lonely girl entering her lover’s house, and these interpretations are: An unmarried girl who dreams of entering her lover’s house, this dream symbolizes that marriage between her and her lover will happen soon, God willing, And that she will move to live in that house. Among the interpretations provided by scholars, this vision symbolizes the feelings of trust and security that this girl feels towards the person she loves and shows that she feels safe in her relationship with him and that he has the ability to protect her from him. . The dangers that may threaten her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing her beloved’s sister in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of seeing her beloved sister in a dream vary, depending on the details that came in the dream, as follows: An unmarried girl sees her lover’s sister in her dream, and her sister was speaking to her with familiarity and intimacy, and this dream One of the good dreams that indicates that there will be a rapprochement between her and the sister in reality, and their relationship. STKO

title: Eating oranges in a dream and interpretation of a dream about eating rotten oranges in a dream

preview.html: Eating an orange in a dream is one of the fruits that has many benefits and benefits, and many people like to eat it because it helps strengthen the digestion process and strengthens the health of the heart and the immune system. The dream has many meanings and we will explain them all to you. Follow us on this article. Eating an orange in a dream Eating an orange in a dream indicates the extent to which The dreamer enjoys good health and a body free of diseases. He sees himself eating oranges in a dream, but their taste was not good. This indicates that he will face many obstacles, crises, and bad things, and he must seek refuge in the Almighty God to help him and save him from all of these. Seeing the dreamer eating oranges in In a dream, he ate an orange, but it tasted bad, so this indicates that he lost a lot of money. Eating oranges in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned many connotations and meanings related to visions of eating oranges in a dream, and we will explain everything he said about this dream. Follow with us the following interpretations: Ibn Sirin explains that eating oranges in a dream means that the dreamer will have two children, if he sees an orange. Seeing oneself eating sour oranges in a dream means that one is suffering from diseases and is not comfortable at all, but one needs to take care of oneself and one’s condition. Health. If the dreamer sees himself eating oranges and their taste is not good in the dream, this is a sign that many negative emotions were able to control him and he must try to get out of this situation. Seeing a person eating oranges in a dream means that he has achieved many achievements and victories in his work. Eating oranges in a dream for a single woman. Eating oranges in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will receive many blessings and good things, and this also describes the emergence of many positive changes for her. Seeing a single dreamer eating oranges in a dream means that he will soon have intercourse with the man he loves. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating oranges in a dream, this is a sign that she will face many obstacles, crises, and bad things in her family or professional life, and she must turn to the Almighty God to help her and save her from all of that. Seeing a single dreamer eating green oranges in a dream means that she will suffer from an illness and that she must take care of her health condition. An unmarried woman who dreams of eating rotten oranges, this leads her to lose a lot of money and fall into great financial distress. Eating an orange in a dream For married people, eating an orange in a dream For a married woman, its taste is delicious, and this indicates how comfortable and happy she feels in her life. Seeing a married fortuneteller eating oranges in a dream means that she will receive many benefits and advantages from her family, and perhaps this describes the extent of her family’s support for her. If a married woman sees that she is eating oranges in In a dream, this is a sign that she will soon hear a lot of good news. Seeing a married dreamer buying oranges and eating them in a dream means that she will be able to achieve everything she wants and strives for, and this means

title: Interpretation of opening a door in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of opening a door in a dream is one of the dream interpretations in which interpreters differ most, due to the ambiguity of the meaning of the door in the dream. The door shows the wife and the door handle shows whether the family is stable or not. If the door is closed. This indicates that this wife's marital life is unstable unless the door is open. This is evidence of the stability that the family is experiencing, and it is also evidence of the degree of understanding between the members of this family, and the interpretation of seeing a door in a dream varies depending on the viewer. Seeing a married woman who is neither pregnant nor single and seeing a man is not the same as seeing a woman. Let us learn about the interpretation of seeing a door open in a dream through our encyclopedia website. Interpretation of opening a door in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a door open when you are single. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is opening the door. This is evidence that this woman was going through many hardships and problems in her life, due to her difficult financial situation, and that is why she did not find anyone to support her, but God Almighty allowed this girl to go. From this bad condition, she lives in a better condition, because that girl will marry a good man and live a happy life with that man, but if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is closing the door? This is proof that this girl is being proposed by many people. But at the moment she does not want to communicate with anyone, and perhaps the secret is that the right man is waiting for that girl at a time other than this time. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is holding the door handle and controlling it. This is evidence that she is manipulating the feelings of the person who loves her, and this is evidence that this girl is not a good girl. Why if it is true? You didn't manipulate that person's feelings, but if you wanted to. She offers him her desire to marry him, even if she doesn't want him to. She has to tell him. So that he does not expect what is not his. Interpretation of seeing the door open in a dream for a married woman: And if a married woman sees in her dream that she is closing the door; This is evidence that this woman is haunted by many difficulties and problems in her married life and is unable to overcome them, but if she sees that she is opening the door in her dream, this is evidence that this woman will open the doors of goodness for her, and will improve her situation and that of her family, and this is evidence that this woman manages... She manages her family affairs as much as she can, and she keeps her husband's money. She is a woman who is loyal to everyone around her and most loyal to her husband. But if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is breaking the threshold of the house. This is evidence that her husband will divorce her and replace her with another woman, and the evidence for this is that our master Abraham, peace be upon him, went to the house of his son Ismail and knocked on the door. So his wife went out to find him and found him to be a man in ugly clothes. When he asked her to feed him and give him water, she refused what she found in this form, so he said to her: If Ishmael came. So tell him that the man greets you, and tells you that he is not at your doorstep, and when Ismail came: Tell him this story to his wife. And he said: He said to me: I said to Ismail: Change your doorstep. So
